services.title: Electrical Services
services.description: We offer a complete range of residential and commercial electrical services, with experienced electricians and top-quality materials.
services.deepCleansingDesc: Detection and repair of electrical faults in panels, outlets, switches and circuits.
services.facialTreatmentsDesc: Installation of LED lighting, fixtures, recessed spotlights and decorative lighting systems.
services.hairRemovalDesc: Installation and replacement of outlets, switches, circuit breakers and electrical fittings.
services.massagesDesc: Installation of home automation systems, smart lighting control and intelligent equipment management.
services.bodyTreatmentsDesc: Installation and replacement of electrical wiring, panels and circuits for new builds or renovations.
services.manicurePedicureDesc: Electrical installations for bathrooms with moisture protection and compliance with safety standards.
services.weightLossDesc: Installation and maintenance of photovoltaic solar panels for renewable energy production.
services.immunityDesc: Electrical installation inspection with diagnostic equipment for problem and risk detection.
services.acneControlDesc: Solutions to reduce energy consumption with modern equipment and efficient LED lighting.

whyChooseUs.qualifiedDesc: Certified electricians with over 15 years of electrical installation experience.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Our clients' opinions are our greatest pride and motivation.

client1.name: Carlos Rodrigues
client1.text: Had a short circuit in the middle of the night and they came in under 1 hour. Fixed the problem quickly and made everything safe. Excellent service!

client2.name: Ana Martins
client2.text: They did the complete electrical installation for our new home. Impeccable work, on time and on budget. 100% recommend!

client3.name: Pedro Santos
client3.text: Installed solar panels on the roof and the home automation system. Very competent professionals and fair price. Five stars!

client4.name: Maria Costa
client4.text: Electrical panel fault resolved quickly with professional equipment. Very friendly and efficient. They're now my go-to electricians!

faq.title: Got Questions? We've Got Answers
faq.description: We've gathered the most common questions from our clients so you can clear up any doubts.
faq.q1: Do you provide after-hours emergency service?
faq.a1: Yes! We have 24/7 emergency service available. For short circuits, power failures or dangerous situations, we respond in under 1 hour.
faq.a2: Yes! We provide free, no-obligation quotes. After assessing the problem, we present a detailed quote before starting any work.
faq.q3: How long does a repair take?
faq.a3: It depends on the type of service. Simple repairs like faulty outlets or switches are usually resolved in 1-2 hours. More complex work like full electrical installations may take a few days.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: We accept cash, debit card, MB Way and bank transfer. For larger jobs, we offer staged payment options.
faq.a5: Yes! All our work comes with a guarantee. We use approved materials and comply with all current electrical safety standards.
faq.q6: Do you work with condominiums and businesses?
faq.a6: Yes! We provide services for individuals, condominiums, businesses and commercial establishments. Maintenance contracts are available.
